title: Project-Based Programming Scaffolding Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducting programming projects to solve social issues based on fieldwork experience

learning_goals: Learners can implement a social issue-solving programming project with over 80% completion accuracy using computer-based scaffolding.
Learners can achieve a defect correction rate of over 90% during the module design phase by incorporating formative assessment feedback.
Learners can achieve over 20% improvement in programming thinking (problem understanding, module design, process design) assessments after project completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
